parameters.name: location_name
parameters.description: Filter by location name (case-insensitive partial match)

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Filter concerts from this date (format: Y-m-d)

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Filter concerts until this date (format: Y-m-d)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort concerts by field (name, year) and direction (asc, desc). Example: year:desc

description.example: A fantastic summer music festival with multiple stages

location_id.description: ID of the location where the concert will take place

date.description: Date and time of the concert

get.description: Returns a list of all locations. If a search parameter is provided, it will filter locations by name, city, or country name.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Optional: Search locations by name, city, or country name. If not provided, all locations will be returned.

source.description: Source of the location (defaults to manual)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort users by field (name, email, created_at) and direction (asc, desc). Example: name:asc
